info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 21 at 10:14PM EST until December 22 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: && ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Housatonic River at Falls Village. * WHEN...Until tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 7.0 feet, Flood stage. The park above Falls Village Dam begins to flood, and water reaches the fields of White Hollow Farms near Limerock Road, and is at the edge of the Housatonic Valley Regional High School fields. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:15 PM EST Thursday the stage was 7.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage just after midnight tonight and continue falling to 5.2 feet Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 7.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Housatonic River Falls Village Flood Stage: 7.0 Observed Stage at Thu 9 pm: 7.2 Forecast: Fri 1 am 7.0 Fri 7 am 6.7 Fri 1 pm 6.4 Fri 7 pm 6.2 Sat 1 am 6.0 Sat 7 am 5.8 Sat 1 pm 5.6 Sat 7 pm 5.5 Sun 1 am 5.3 Sun 7 am 5.2 &&
